Static Variables

maxTouchPoints : Int

The maximum number of concurrent touch points supported by the current device.

Instance Variables

list : Array<FlxTouch>

All active touches including just created, moving and just released.

Instance Methods

destroy() : Void

Clean up memory.

getFirst() : FlxTouch

Return the first touch if there is one, beware of null

justReleased(?TouchArray : Array<FlxTouch>) : Array<FlxTouch>

parameters
TouchArray optional array to fill with touch objects
returns
array with touches
Gets all touches which were just ended

parameters
TouchArray optional array to fill with touch objects
returns
array with touches
Gets all touches which were just started

onFocus() : Void

onFocusLost() : Void

reset() : Void

Resets all touches to inactive state.

toString() : String

update() : Void

Called by the internal game loop to update the touch position in the game world. Also updates the just pressed/just released flags.
